title: A Day of healing
creator_credit: Filmcentre (Melbourne), Associated World Public Relations and Allan Dickes
brief_description: Starting with a little of the history of the Austin Hospital, Melbourne, the film quickly moves into the day to day workings of the hospital and many of its special treatment departments - including the kitchen which prepares 2500 meals a day.
